At the same time, I kept nurturing my true passion‚Äîmovement, balance, and energy. Inspired by martial arts and Eastern healing traditions, my focus naturally shifted. signature_reflexology.title: Signature Reflexology Massage
signature_reflexology.description:
"A massage that combines inner cleansing through foot reflex points to restore balance and your inner peace, while targeting debilitating issues."

Our reflexology massage combines targeted reflexology with detox techniques for a holistic approach to health. The session begins with an initial detox phase, using natural oils and massage to relax the foot and stimulate reflex points linked to the urinary, digestive and lymphatic systems, preparing the body for deeper work.

Next, we move into the reflexology phase that focuses on specific reflex points to address areas of discomfort and support the body's natural healing. The treatment concludes with a "The 3 Ways of Purification" cleansing detox phase, revisiting key points to enhance its effects, leaving you feeling light, balanced, and revitalized.

This unique combination promotes deep relaxation while addressing specific imbalances for overall well-being.

executive_detox.title: Executive Detox Massage
executive_detox.description:
"A massage that combines inner cleansing through foot reflex points to restore balance and well-being."

We begin with a gentle warm-up using a natural oil to relax the feet and prepare them for deeper work. The session then transitions into a special ritual called "The 3 Ways of Purification", designed to support your body's natural cleansing processes. By stimulating specific reflex points, we encourage the elimination of toxins through the digestive, reproductive, and lymphatic systems, promoting a sense of lightness and inner balance.
